title: Bugsplatted
body: I have been bugsplatted around five times today all for no real reason by my understanding.  I am waiting in Queue and suddenly when I accept it, it kicks me off the home page and closes LOL completely.  I am wondering is there any reason to it?

replies.body: If you're seeing the actual bugsplat screen pop up with an error, it might mean that some of the League files are damaged somehow. If that's the case, I'd suggest running a repair through the client options to make sure you have a fresh install of League to work with!

I hope you enjoy reading this TL;DR I'm going to send your way tomorrow. You won't believe it, but I was actually transported (through the power of magic) to the LPL servers even though my account is based in NA. I'll try to keep it light and humorous for you too.
